html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13572018-11-01,  ,  PS,  CBSA,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to improve the Canadian Border Service Agency’s inventory management by allowing removal orders to be more easily enforced and to reduce the administrative burden place on officers abroad when they receive an application for a visa, Electronic Travel Authorization or authorization to return to Canada from a foreign national who is subject to an unenforced removal order.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0232 Publication Date: 2018-11-14
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to improve the Canadian Border Service Agency’s inventory management by allowing removal orders to be more easily enforced and to reduce the administrative burden place on officers abroad when they receive an application for a visa, Electronic Travel Authorization or authorization to return to Canada from a foreign national who is subject to an unenforced removal order.
